name: Slime Jam
description:
A slime takes part in a multi-colored world, where he has to venture throughout obstacles and enemies to reach the flag at the end! The slime has no air control, so you have to make your jumps precise, and then jump again once you touch the ground! This game was also inspired by the "2 frame" limitation of this game jam.

CONTROLS - A, D (move) F (shoot) SPACE (jump)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ATTRIBUTIONS:

Sound: http://twitter.com/yuhayliljay
